Package hb.math.graph

Class Summary
Cluster A set of vertices is called a cluster of vertices.
Dimension  
Edge An edge is a pair of vertices; (u,v), where u,v belongs to V and u!
Graph Defines a graph G=G(V,E), where V is a set of vertices and E is a set of edges.
JunctionTree Defines a graph G=G(V,E)<\I>, where V is a set of vertices and E is a set of edges.
Sepset A sepset of vertices is a set of vertices that seperates two specified clusters, X and Y.
Vertex A vertex is an element belonging to the vertex set V in a graph G=(V,E), where E is the edge-set where each edge-element connects two vertices.
